skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: twenty forty eight
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play the fun and relaxing puzzle game where you join tiles to get to 2048!

FEATURES
• Free to play
• Move tiles by voice, touch, or Fire TV remote
• Save stats like best score, least moves, and total number of wins

HOW TO PLAY
• Swipe anywhere or use the arrows to move the tiles
• When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one
• You win when you reach the 2048 tile
• You lose when there is no more room for new tiles

THINGS TO SAY
•"Alexa, move left"
•"Alexa, show stats"
• "Alexa, new game"

2048 is only supported on the Echo Show 10, Echo Show 8 and Echo Show 5, and Fire TV.

Based on the official and original 2048 game available on the web (https://play2048.co/) and open-sourced on GitHub (https://github.com/gabrielecirulli/2048)

FEEDBACK
Ideas? Issues? Questions? If you'd like to leave feedback or get in touch, please leave us an e-mail at whoa.labs.for.alexa@gmail.com. We love to hear from you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
